name: Fall Ball Fall
description:
WARNINGS

Chrome extensions can cause the game to load very slowly (including uBlock). If the game takes longer than 10 secs to load, try disabling them or using Firefox.

This game leans on the strategic side. If you get stuck because of your build, prestige to reset and try again!

Buying towers will raise their cost in all stages. Plan your economy to account for this.

There is no save feature in this version, I couldn't get around to it :(

Join my Discord for more game design chat! https://discord.gg/feafSea
